Actions.Name: Get audiences
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of the available audiences.

Actions.Name: Get languages
Actions.Description: Returns a list of the available languages.

Actions.Name: Get media by ID
Actions.Description: Retrieves the details of a media that can be syndicated.

Actions.Name: Get a list of media
Actions.Description: Retrieve media available in the Content Services system.

Actions.Name: Get media by tag ID
Actions.Description: Retrieves media objects using a tag ID.

Actions.Name: Get media types
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of the available media types.

Actions.Name: Get organizations
Actions.Description: Returns a list of the available organizations.

Actions.Name: Get organization types
Actions.Description: Returns a list of the available organization types.

Actions.Name: Get sources
Actions.Description: Returns a list of the available sources.

Actions.Name: Retrieve tag by ID
Actions.Description: Retrieves a tag object using its ID.

Actions.Name: Get related tags
Actions.Description: Retrieves tag objects related to another tag.

Actions.Name: Get tags
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of available tags.

Actions.Name: Get tag types
Actions.Description: Returns a list of the available tag types.

Actions.Name: Get topics
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of the available topics.
